data.title: Backend Developer
data.description: In this backend developer role I have managed the internal business logic of Melia Hotels, as well as other projects. I have also created complete integrations with other services in order to expose an API to the front end. I have worked with technologies such as Spring Boot, Spring Gateway and Spring Security. I have also had experience with Docker development, as well as development upload processes and container management in Argo. I have consumed data from relational and non-relational databases and have dealt with sending and receiving messages through Kafka queues.

data.title: Full Stack Developer
data.description: In this new role I have managed the development of complete new screens of an RMS, from the creation of the backend logic to the creation of the frontend design. Working with technologies like React, Jest, Cypress, SWR and fetch. Another milestone achieved in this new role is getting new projects for Melia. I have implemented in a project without testing, a complete testing with jest and cypress, reducing in 10 minutes the deployment time.
